Priest Wagner: May Eva's protection be with you! This may be a library, but any place where knowledge is prized is a suitable spot for religious discussions, meditations and even worship. I know some of the Humans here do not share those views, but I have learned that it is better sometimes to bend like the reed than break like the oak...
